key_resolutions: The Director, NIT Agartala, is authorized to function as Chairperson in the event of vacancy and take decisions as per NIT Act 2007 and NIT Statute 2009, including presiding over Convocation, signing Degree Certificates, and other necessary actions.
If formal communication regarding a new Chairperson is received from MHRD before the 7th Convocation, the appointed Chairperson will preside over the Convocation.
The Director, NIT Agartala, will continue to discharge functions of the Chairperson until a new Chairperson is appointed for smooth functioning of the Institute.
